Articles.Content: Exactly what it means, changing texture, collor and pattern of tanks and fairings

Painting fuel tanks can be done with the right mods- I think it’s TUFX and TU recolour to repaint both stock and a number of modded parts. I don’t expect this to be added as a stock option in KSP but it’s confirmed for KSP2.
